origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TaxAPI.prepare_tax_filing', 'description': 'This function assists in preparing a tax filing based on the individual's income, deductions, and filing status.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'income', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The total income of the individual.'}, {'name': 'deductions', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The total amount of deductions.'}, {'name': 'tax_filing_status', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The filing status of the individual, e.g., single, married filing jointly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'tax_liability', 'description': 'The calculated tax liability after applying deductions.'}, {'name': 'filing_instructions', 'description': 'Instructions for filing the tax return.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 TaxAPI.prepare_tax_filing, 它的参数输入如下: 'income'是'80000', 'deductions'是'15000', 'tax_filing_status'是'single'.
